SEARCH

Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.api

@NonNullByDefault package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.api
Contains various APIs used by AnimatedArchitectureSpigot that need to be implemented by a sub-platform. This allows for using these interfaces in all modules for the Spigot platform without running into cyclic dependencies.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util
    Provides utility classes that depend on the Spigot API and can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
    nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.hooks
    Contains a set of utility classes that provide compatibility with other plugins.
    nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.implementations
    Provides implementations of AnimatedArchitecture core interfaces that can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
    nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.text
    Provides utility classes and Text implementations that depend on the Spigot API and can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    IBlockAnalyzerSpigot
    Specialization of the block analyzer for the Spigot platform.
    IPermissionsManagerSpigot
    This interface is used to provide a permissions manager for Spigot.
